activities: Agencies of Change, LLC intends to use personal information for the following purposes: 1) Human Resources data of employees and contractors in the EU, which will be transferred to the United States, to facilitate employee management and administration; and, 2) Data collected from clients in the EU, and transferred to the United States, for marketing purposes on behalf of our clients.
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Partners and Alliances
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Agencies of Change, LLC (formerly imc2, LLC) employees in the EU may seek complaint resolution internally, in accordance with Agencies of Change LLC's existing procedures.  If efforts to resolve concerns are unsatisfactory, employees may contact their local EU Data Protection Panel (DPAs) office.  Agencies of Change, LLC  will cooperate in the resolution of such inquiries and will comply with the advice given by the EU Data Protection Panel.
